title: Liverpool legend Steven Gerrard points finger at referee for controversial Wolves opener in FA Cup fourth round
text:

Liverpool legend Steven Gerrard has pointed the finger at referee Craig Pawson after Wolves' controversial opener. 
The Reds suffered an early shock as Richard Stearman headed home after just 53 seconds in the FA Cup fourth round tie at Anfield. 
Not only was the Wolves defender offside, but Helder Costa seemed to move the ball significantly forward before delivering the free-kick and Gerrard is unhappy with the officiating. 
"The referee has let Liverpool down here," Gerrard told BT Sport at half-time. "Not just the offside but where the free-kick was taken from." Stearman wheels away in delight after scoring (Photo: Getty Images) Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
